author: gstein
msg: Implement a first pass at a Python version of the (unmaintained!)
Java-based STV vote tool that the ASF uses.
Except for floating point roundoff, this produces exactly the same
values and results for the 2011 election, as the Java tool running in
More work is needed to add cmdline parsing, to directly consume the
voter tool output format, and to simplify/pythonify the code further.

author: rubys
msg: Deal better with Voter output (specifically, truncation)

author: gstein
msg: (read_nominees): throw out the string replacements. we know the target
file name is 'board_nominations.ini', so just go there. and simplify
the construction of a dictionary of letter-to-name.
